explains: adj. 膨胀的，可充气的；得意的
wordGroup: inflatable boat 充气艇；充气橡皮艇；充气式小艇

sentences.en: The children were playing on the inflatable castle.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在充气城堡上玩。

sentences.en: Greenpeace managed to assemble a small flotilla of inflatable boats to waylay the ship at sea.
sentences.cn: 绿色和平组织设法聚集了一支充气艇小舰队去拦截海上的那艘船。

sentences.en: It takes the inflatable chair more than five minutes to fill with air.
sentences.cn: 充气椅需要超过5分钟才能充满空气。
